overview: A pregnant Naaz who is given triple talaq by her husband Shahid, can't take the shock and tries to kill herself. She is saved by Rasheed who marries her and gives her a new lease of life. However, when later in life she comes across a triple talaq situation, she chooses to fight it rather than let go.
tagline: A Touching Tale of An Indian Muslim Woman Who Fights Against the Issue of Triple Talak!
title: Talak! Talak! Talak!
